Formation présentielle en électronique e: In-person Training in Electronics and Computer Science
Découvrez notre formation spécialisée en: Discover our specialized training in Robotics. Learn to master the fundamental principles of electronics and computer science while developing complete and interactive robotic projects. This hands-on training allows you to acquire skills in electronic circuit design, microcontroller programming, and the creation of intelligent robots tailored to various needs, ranging from home applications to industrial uses.
Cette formation s'adresse à plusieurs pr: This training is aimed at various profiles interested in robotics:
Les professionnels cherchant à améliorer: Professionals looking to enhance their skills in electronics, microcontroller programming, and the design of Arduino-based robotic systems.
Ceux qui souhaitent approfondir leurs co: Those who wish to deepen their knowledge in robotics by learning to design and build intelligent robots for practical applications like industrial automation.
Étudiants en Électronique, Informatique: Students in Electronics, Computer Science, or Mechatronics:
Les étudiants désirant se spécialiser da: Students wishing to specialize in robotics by mastering essential concepts such as motor control, sensor usage, and object-oriented programming.
Les amateurs de bricolage et d'électroni: DIY enthusiasts and electronics hobbyists who want to build their own robotic projects, exploring sensors, actuators, and interactive interfaces.
Ceux qui souhaitent acquérir les compéte: Those who wish to acquire the necessary skills to teach robotics and intelligent systems, mastering the design of educational and practical solutions for industry or education.
Cette formation a pour objectif de vous: This training aims to teach you the fundamentals of electronics and computer science, as well as the realization of concrete projects with the Arduino board. You will learn to handle electronic components, program microcontrollers, and develop embedded systems, leading to the creation of advanced robotic and home automation projects.
À la fin de la formation, vous serez cap: At the end of the training, you will be able to:
Apprenez à manipuler des composants élec: Learn to handle essential electronic components (resistors, capacitors, transistors, etc.) and understand the fundamental principles of circuits.
Familiarisez-vous avec la logique de pro: Familiarize yourself with programming logic, algorithms, and code structures, and develop solutions using microcontrollers.
Mettez en pratique vos connaissances en: Put your knowledge into practice by creating interactive systems using sensors, motors, and various interfaces.
Appliquez vos compétences pour développe: Apply your skills to develop robotic projects and home automation systems, from prototyping to final realization.
Association de batteries en série et par: Connecting Batteries in Series and Parallel
Association des résistances en série et: Connecting Resistors in Series and Parallel
Lire la valeur du condensateur: Reading the Value of a Capacitor
Mesurer la valeur de condensateur: Measuring the Value of a Capacitor
Association des condensateurs en série e: Connecting Capacitors in Series and Parallel
Association des bobine en série et en pa: Connecting Inductors in Series and Parallel
Choisir entre une Boucle while et for: Choose between a While Loop and For Loop
Utiliser des propriétés et des méthodes: Use properties and methods of an object
Comprendre les notions de classe et d'ob: Understand the concepts of class and object
Partie 3 : Réalisation des projets avec: Part 3: Project Implementation with the Arduino Board
Découvrez notre formation spécialisée en: Discover our specialized training in Home Automation and Internet of Things (IoT). Learn to master the latest technologies to create intelligent connected systems for home and industry. This hands-on training allows you to acquire skills in programming, web interface design, sensor and actuator integration, and automation through home automation platforms like Home Assistant.
Cette formation s'adresse à plusieurs pr: This training is aimed at various profiles interested in home automation and the Internet of Things (IoT):
Les professionnels souhaitant élargir le: Professionals looking to expand their skills in IoT programming and master the ESP8266, ESP32, and ESP32-CAM microcontrollers to create connected systems.
Ceux qui travaillent dans le domaine de: Those who work in the field of home automation and seek to deepen their knowledge about the integration of smart devices like Sonoff, Shelly, and automation with Home Assistant.
Étudiants en Électronique, Informatique: Students in Electronics, Computer Science, or Automation:
Les étudiants voulant se spécialiser dan: Students wanting to specialize in emerging IoT technologies and learn to develop intelligent solutions for home or industry.
Les amateurs de bricolage technologique: Technology and electronics DIY enthusiasts who wish to design their own connected systems, create practical projects (robotics, sensors, automation), and explore the possibilities offered by IoT.
Ceux qui cherchent à développer leur pro: Those looking to develop their own business in the smart home and automation sector, learning to design and implement advanced home automation solutions.
Cette formation a pour objectif de vous: This training aims to teach you how to design, program, and deploy complete home automation and IoT systems. You will learn to master the ESP8266, ESP32, and ESP32-CAM microcontrollers, create interactive web interfaces, automate connected devices, and use home automation platforms like Home Assistant. You will also discover IoT communication protocols, cloud integration, and device management through practical projects.
À la fin de la formation, vous serez cap: At the end of the training, you will be able to:
ESP8266, ESP32, ESP32-CAM pour la gestio: ESP8266, ESP32, ESP32-CAM for managing connected devices.
Développement d’applications web respons: Developing responsive web applications with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Utilisation de dispositifs Sonoff, Shell: Using Sonoff, Shelly devices, and automation via Home Assistant.
Communication sans fil avec Bluetooth, M: Wireless communication with Bluetooth, MQTT, and data synchronization with Firebase.
Création d'une jauge réactive avec HTML: Creating a responsive gauge with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Création de boutons réactifs avec HTML C: Creating responsive buttons with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Création d'une diapositive réactive avec: Creating a responsive slide with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Creating a responsive Cards with HTML CS: Creating responsive cards with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Création de cartes réactives avec HTML C: Creating responsive cards with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Communication entre Raspberry pi et ESP: Communication between Raspberry Pi and ESP
Création d'une page responsive avec HTML: Creating a responsive page with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Création du serveur Backend avec Node.js: Creation of the Backend Server with Node.js and Express
Communication entre le serveur backend e: Communication between the Backend Server and the ESP Server
Partie 2 : Domotique avec Sonoff et Shel: Part 2: Home Automation with Sonoff and Shelly
Capteur magnétique détection d'ouverture: Magnetic Sensor for Door Opening Detection
Configuration de home assistant sur la r: Configuration of Home Assistant on Raspberry Pi
Ce qui est utilisé dans ce cours :: What is Used in This Course:
Découvrez notre formation complète en Co: Discover our comprehensive training in Printed Circuit Board (PCB) Design and Manufacturing. Learn to master each step of the process, from schematic simulation to the realization of concrete electronic circuit projects. This hands-on training will allow you to acquire in-depth skills in electronics, circuit simulation, and PCB design, covering projects related to automation and system control.
Cette formation est destinée à plusieurs: This training is intended for several profiles interested in printed circuit board design and electronics:
Ceux qui souhaitent développer des compé: Those who want to develop advanced skills in circuit simulation, PCB design, and embedded system integration.
Les professionnels cherchant à approfond: Professionals looking to deepen their knowledge of printed circuit board design for embedded and industrial systems.
Les amateurs de projets électroniques qu: Electronics enthusiasts who want to design their own electronic systems from scratch, from simulation to PCB manufacturing.
Ceux qui souhaitent lancer des produits: Those who wish to launch innovative products in the field of electronics and learn how to design and manufacture printed circuit boards for various projects.
Cette formation a pour objectif de vous: This training aims to teach you the design, simulation, and manufacturing of printed circuit boards (PCBs). You will learn to master electronic schematic simulation tools, design professional PCBs, and realize concrete projects like power supplies, motor drivers, and embedded systems with Arduino and ESP32. You will also discover the steps involved in the manufacturing and prototyping of circuits.
Concevoir et simuler des circuits électr: Design and simulate complex electronic circuits (RLC, counters, decoders, multiplexers).
Réaliser des schémas électroniques et co: Create electronic schematics and design printed circuit boards for various electronic projects.
Programmer et intégrer des microcontrôle: Program and integrate microcontrollers into practical electronic projects such as power supplies, motor drivers, and connected systems.
Comprendre le processus complet de fabri: Understand the complete PCB manufacturing process, from design to assembly, including testing and prototyping.
